data: The person Michael Brown is the Chief Operating Officer with extensive experience in global operations and scaling businesses.
The person Michael Brown has 20 years of experience in finance and operations.
The person Michael Brown has expertise in risk management, mergers and acquisitions, and global supply chain.
The person Michael Brown led a merger integration worth $5B.
The person Michael Brown reduced operational costs by 25%.
The person Michael Brown conducted research by reviewing the company annual report 2023, speaking with alumni network contacts, and tracking patent filings in Q2.
The person Michael Brown is located in London, England.
